For business or pleasure, alone, with family or friends, for a day or for a month, we offer a big duplex on the third floor in our typical Brussels styled home dating from 1905.

We are happy to welcome you and make sure your stay is unique and authentic by offering flexible lodging solutions according to the length of your stay. We are located in
a green part of the city not far from the airport, the NATO, the European Parliament, the Grand-Place, the Atomium and Heysel.

Brussels urban public transport has many stops nearby (3 min. on foot) ready to take you to all the popular sights around town. For example, a tram ride to the city centre (Magritte Museum and Place Royale) to the Atomium or Heysel only takes 15 minuts (6 stops).

The Jamar Loft Bed and Breakfast is a guest house located in an apartment in Brussels. It offers a single room 20 minutes walk from the famous Grand Place and Central. It is only 200 m from the Gare du Midi, a perfect location if you arrive by train in the Belgian capital. Being near a station of this size, you will have all the public transport network of the city, which will allow you to easily move and access to every corner farthest you want to visit.
The room that makes up the Jamar Loft Bed and Breakfast is located in a spacious apartment of 90 m2 and saw the owner who rents a double room. There is private parking (fee). As a guest, you can access all areas of the apartment as the fully equipped kitchen (washing machine, dryer and dishwasher), large living room and bathroom. The room has a double bed, desk, wireless Internet access and a Nintendo Wii. Sheets and towels are available (surcharge). In the lounge you can enjoy the TV player of DVDs and CDs

Located near Avenue Louise, Le Flat welcomes you in a bright and spacious studio with private entrance. Overlooking a cute cosy garden while being at walking distance from the heart of the city, your stay in Brussels will definitely feel like home. 55 m2 at your disposal, Le Flat is bright, fresh and airy.

Very spacious and well equipped, the bathroom and its state-of-the-art walk-in shower is loved by everyone. As you can see on the pictures, there is a coffee corner with Nespresso coffee maker, kettle, fridge, microwave and sink; but beware that it is not a real kitchen, although there is a microwave to heat food (no stove nor oven). If you wish to eat in, there are many takeaways in the neighbourhood (asian, italian, ...). There is also a supermarket nearby with plenty of ready-made options.

Near the South train station, which connects Brussels to other cities in Europe, is one of the last traditional breweries, Cantillon. Almost nothing has changed since the brewery opened in 1900. But beer isn't all the country has to offer.

Other things to note
CHEZ NOUS
Notre appartement est un "véritable" airbnb que nous mettons à disposition des voyageurs en notre absence.

Comme c'est un airbnb, le lieu est géré et nettoyé avec le soin que nous apportons à notre habitation quand nous recevons des personnes que nous apprécions.


PERSONNE DE CONTACT
Le nettoyage et les check in sont assurés par une personne qui fera le déplacement jusqu'au airbnb pour vous accueillir.
Cette personne prendra contact avec vous dans les 72h-48h avant votre arrivée.
Nous privilégions l'emploi de WhatsApp.

HEURES DE CHECK IN
- Les check in sont assurés tous les jours entre 15h et 21h.

CHEC IN TARDIF
- Si vous prévoyez d'arriver entre 21h et minuit (check in tardif) : merci de verser €10 en c

Indeed, we understand that organising the perfect stay is just like preparing your favorite cocktail ! Invented at Harry’s Bar, Venice in 1924, the Peach Bellini quickly became a chic and classic cocktail. It is its sweet side, deliciously soft, that attracted us straight away.
The Peach Bellini room is classic, luminous and fluffy. It feels like a private flat in the swell neighbourhood of the Belgian capital.
The colours : bright orange reminding us of the main cocktail ingredient and pastel colours, egg shell and pistachio.
The furniture : 1970s Scandina

FAQ :

Beautiful 136 sq. mt. apartment with 2 bedrooms located on the 3rd floor with elevator in the heart of the European District of Brussels.

The space
This apartment is located inside Palazzo Michel-Ange, consisting of 32 units spread out over 5 floors that are managed exclusively by Halldis. This apartment opens onto a large living room with 2 entrances that overlooks the internal courtyard. It is furnished with a sofa bed (180 cm x 200 cm), second sofa with chaise longue, flat-screen TV, large open floor plan kitchen with a raised dining table (extension of the kitchen counter), and 6 stools. The kitchen has 4 electric burners, extractor hood, dishwasher, refrigerator with freezer compartment, oven, microwave, toaster, coffee machine, electric kettle, cutlery and flatware for 6 guests.

L'appartement se situe à 2 minutes à pieds des arrêts de métro Gare de l'ouest et Delacroix qui vous emmènent au centre ville en 5 minutes et à l'Atomium en 10 minutes.
Beaucoup de supermarchés sont à proximités ainsi que des restaurants.

The apartment is 2 min away from the metro stations Delacroix and West Station. They can take you to downtown in 5 minutes or to the Atomium and Roi Baudoin Stadium in 10 minutes.
A lot of supermarket and restaurants/fastfoods surround the apartment.

Plusieurs aménagement sont à votre dispositions tels qu'un four à micro onde, un frigo, de la vaisselle, un percolateur, du shampoing etc.

Several facilities are at your disposal such as a microwave oven, a fridge, dishes, a coffee maker, shampoo and so on.

Charmant studio situé à 3min à pied du quartier européen, à 5min à pied de flagey et à 10min en bus de la grande place de bruxelles.

Flat roof house (2floors) with rose garden and orangerie in a calm spacy neighbourhood;

Stylish Art Nouveau 2 bedroom Apt
In European district, metro Schuman, easy access to Centre, extremely close nice park Cinquantenaire, many buses (21/12 airport in front of flat, a 30-mn ride), a few mns walk to shops, supermarket, bars, restaurants, laundries (dryers). 2nd floor, NO lift. Renovated original Liberty building. 2ble glazing. 2 balconies, 1 with good East-South orientation (light) as for the kitchen (bow window). Washing & dish machines. Nespresso, 2 ovens. 1 bathroom/WC.

Peaceful Quartier at the heart of Cosmopolite Brussels.
Walking distance from Grand Place and tourist attractions.
Walking distance from EU quartier (20min) in case you need an accommodation for your business trip.

The space
Light and large space (86m2) to relax from the bustling city.

Secured new building - you will have outside key and an inside key to the appartment.

Charmant 1 chambre de 50m2 bien isolé et au 1er étage. A 5 min à pieds du Parc de Forest et du Parc Duden et proche de toutes les commodités, de la Gare du Midi et du Parvis de St-Gilles. L'appartement est très lumineux avec une vue dégagée et un petit balcon ainsi qu'un salon en coin cosy (qui peut se transformer en lit) et une cuisine super équipée. Salle de douche et toilettes attenantes à la chambre. Parfait pour une personne seule ou un couple en visite à Bxl.

The space
Ce petit appartement une chambre vous séduira de par sa luminosité. Situé au premier étage, il dispose d'une vue dégagée et d'un grand calme. Très pratique, il dispose de toutes les commodités et de tout le confort dont vous aurez besoin pour une séjour seul ou en couple. Une cuisine super équipée, une salle de douche, une chambre avec armoire pour vos vêtements et un salon cosy décoré au fil de mes voyages.

Superb apartment in a new house, 3rd floor with lift, 50 meters from Grand Place and 5 min walk from Central Station in the historic center of Brussels.
Entrance hall, equipped kitchen-dining room-living room with a lux sofa (turns to 180x220 comfortable bed), bedroom with a bed for 2 people (can be split in two beds 80x200). Bathroom and a shower. Baby bed and chair. Max 4 adults + 1 baby.
Coffee-tea mini breakfast kit offered.
Many bars, restaurants, shops 24/7, transport nearby.

The space
Unique 1 bedroom appartement in a new building (2017) in the heart of historic center , with a big lift (elevator).
Special heating-cooling system "double flux" -never cold or hot inside
Terrasse vue lateral Grande Place belfrey.
Very good for a couple, but can comfortably acommodate up to 4 adults
and a child (baby bed). Very quite and private.

Welcome to Brussels, the capital of Europe!

It is with pleasure that I will share my charming apartment located in the heart of the city.

Located along the Brussels Canal in the "Quays district", the apartment is close to many emblematic cultural sites (Kanal-Centre Pompidou, Kaaitheater, Tour&Taxis, the Flemish Royal Theater, the old Docks of the City, Sainte-Catherine square & the Dansaert district, ...) and is 10-15 minutes walk from the Grand Place and the touristic centre.

The space
Spacious and bright, my apartment is located in a historic Art-Deco building (J. LEGEAR-1924) with a view on the canal which crosses the city. The apartment has been recently completely renovated. It combines comfort and authenticity in the heart of downtown Brussels. Minimalist and full of greenery, my urban garden is the perfect place to start your journey, feel the soul of the city and discover the “Brussels way of life”. Passionate about my city, I wil

The flat is situated in the front of the Minimes Cathedral on the 2nd floor of a 3 levels building. The flat is surrounded by lots of Cafés, bars, Markets & Restaurants
*Transport: 8 min from Metro Louise Tram, Train Stations.
*Parking: A parking is available for a 6€/Day just beside the building.
*Shopping:https://www.heures.be/bruxelles/ixelles/avenue-louise
*Monuments&Attractions:https://www.introducingbrussels.com/monuments-attractions
*Museums:https://www.introducingbrussels.com/museums

The space
The location of the flat makes this place unique. This is a must because of his practical accommodation that we decided to maintain simple. The particularity of this street lies in the fact that it houses most African art dealers in Belgium. It is also one of the largest centers of African art in the world.

Guest access
access to the entire flat

Petit studio (kot)de 15 m² indépendant  pour 2 personnes maximum complètement rénové et équipé (four combi micro-onde, canpé convertible 2 personnes) et très calme dans un quartier très tendance à Ixelles à 200 mètres de la place du châtelain et de la prestigeuse maison HORTA)!  Grand place à 15 minutes! nombreux restos dans le quartier et petit déjeuner (le pain  du chatelain (thé room). Superette, grande surface à 5 minutes à pied!Il est au 3ème  étage sans ascenseur!
A music room, candles and a fairy ambience to let you sleep and relax like never before.

Mon appartement est lumineux. Espace partagé avec moi, travaille à la maison.
Salle à manger & cuisine à partager. Chambre, salle de bain & WC privés. Jolie terrasse plein Sud.

My apartment is bright. Space shared with me, home worker.
Dining room & kitchen to share. Private room, bathroom & WC. Nice south Terrace.

Proche du Palais Royal, Place Jeu de Balle, Grand Place. Ambiance calme et chaleur en plein coeur de Bruxelles!
Transport : Métro Hotel des Monnaies & Louise, tram 3-4-92-93-94-51

The space
Spatiaux, lumineux, rénové, dans une maison de charme Bruxelloise.

Nice and quiet 60m2 flat at the 4th floor of a typical Brussels building.
I did all the renovation myself using ecological material.
Close to the european area and 20min away from the touristic center. Bus and tramway accessible at 20 meters.

The space
A sweet nest under the roof. Feel like a scandinavian chalet.
All equiped with full kitchen, wifi, washing machine, sheets and towels.
I tried to be as much ecofriendly so as less "one-time use" plastic as possible, lot of 2nd hand or recycle stuff, and I do washing liquids myself.

Other things to note
According to the last GIEC/IPCC report we should low the house temp at 19° during the day and 17° during the night to preserve the planet, so you know... but you do what you want ;-).

Hello! My flat is situated in the historical quarter of Brussels, within walking distance of Grande Place, Gare du Midi and Gare Centrale (20' train ride from Zaventem airport), and well connected ( 5’ walk from metro and tram lines).

It is very bright and airy, and it can host up to 4 people (1 queen sized bed + 1 sofa bed x2), kitchen, bathroom. It has a pharmacy, cafés, restaurants, a supermarket, swimming pool, and organic market nearby. Any questions, just ask, I’d be happy to help!

Guest access
You will have the whole flat to yourself

Comfortable twin bed room in a beautiful "Maison de Maître" in Uccle. You will have a breakfast every morning. Furnished with a microwave and a kettle. The room is on the street side.

The space
Located in a charming small avenue in Uccle, this a typical 19th century Brussels house, with comfort and space.
The room is on the second floor whitout a lift.
Freshly renovated independant studio (3rd floor) perfect for tourists

A proximité de la Commission européenne, musées, tourisme, grand-place... Un cadre architectural à connaître ! Sortie et restaurants de tous styles et de tous prix à 2 pas ! Accès facile aux bus, tram et métro ! Un quartier vivant et sympathique !
Nous mettrons tout en oeuvre pour vous accueillir !

A superb 2-bedroom apartment for up to 4 people. Totally independent and private with all modern facilities and unlimited free wireless internet access. The apartment has direct access to a magnificent huge and well kept garden and a private terrace.

No deposit needed!
Flexible cancellation policy!
Keys are handed in site 24/24
Free luggage storage.
Immediate reply.

A totally equipped kitchen, with kitchenware, a dishwasher, a cooker with glass ceramic cook tops, a micro-wave, a large fridge and a dining table for 6 people.

Bel appartement qui offre un excellent confort
situé au premier étage dans un immeuble résidentiel. Il est situé en plein centre historique de la ville de Bruxelles, proche de la gare du Midi. Il est à proximité des commerces et restaurants.

Vous pouvez utiliser le logement entièrement. Les draps et serviettes sont fournis.

Private bedroom 16m2 locked, single bed, closet/drawer, with a terrace view on garden, very clean. A kitchen, shower, wc, are sharing with only one other Airbnb guest at the same floor.

Quite and safe.

Superbe duplex au calme dans une des plus belles ruelles classées au cœur de Bruxelles. À deux pas de la place Sainte-Catherine et de son quartier branché. Facilement accessible en transports en commun (train, métro, bus) ou en voiture, parking public à proximité. Le point de départ idéal pour la découverte de Bruxelles, la Belle.

This charming Grand Place residence is located right in the centre of Brussels, merely 25 meters from the magnificent UNESCO Belgian site - the Grand Place. This cosy studio is perfect for a couple. Welcome to Saint Gilles :)

Our home is located in the Brussels neighborhood of Saint Gilles, where you'll find lots of cafés, bars and nice restaurants. It's lively but not noisy :) you'll have easy access to the city centre and you can enjoy the sunshine in parks nearby (or just be lazy in our sunny terrace).

CHARMANT DUPLEX sous les toits avec terrasse. Saint Gilles. Centré et calme.
Welcom to all human!

La salle de bain est à coté de votre lit et il y a une porte ;-).
Je dois passer par votre chambre pour aller à la salle de bain, une fois par jour.

Beautiful, bright and comfortable apartment of 85m2 which ideally located as you are at a walking distance of Avenue Louise (close to many public transports, shops and restaurants) .The apartment is decorated with a lot of taste, is well equipped and has all the comfort needed for you to feel at home away from home. Appartement en Triplex de 150m2 situé dans le quartier Louise et Stefani, à proximité des tram 92, 93, 94 et des métros 2 et 6. ONLY FOR SHORT STAYS MAX 3 NIGHTS. Occasionally we rent our own apartment through airbnb. Therefore it is also fully equipped with everything you need for a relaxing stay. The house is suitable for students, couples, solo adventurers, business travellers and even families with children.

This cute little flat has just been renovated and can welcome up to 5 persons and is located in a lively and pleasant neighborhood of Brussels.

The space
The flat is really charming and comfortable as it has a wooden floor and big windows in the dining area that let the light pass through the living room.

It has been recently renovated !

There is one bedroom with a modern private bathrooms and one double bed . On advanced request , there’s possibility to separate it and make it two single beds.

The living room includes a comfortable sofa-bed for two and another sofa bed for one.

The kitchen is fully equipped and has an electric cooking plate, an oven, a big fridge and a dishwasher.

Guest access
You have access to the whole apartment

In the centre and oldest neighbourhood of Brussels, the house is at a foot distance from places of interest such as the Manneken Pis, the Justice Palace, or Grand-Place. The house does not face the street; it is at the back of another house, separated to it by a little patio. It has two floors; the first one has an open kitchen and a living room area, the second one has a bedroom and a bathroom. The floors are connected with stairs that may be unsuitable to older persons or young children.

The space
This house is unique because of its size; it feels cosy because it is small, yet it is big enough to feel spacious as well. Being in one of the most well-known streets of Brussels because of its restaurants, antiquarians, bars, and other kinds of shop, everything is very near yet street noises are not heard as it does not face the street.

Guest access
The guests will have access to a little patio, a kitchen-livingroom, a bedroom and a bathroom.<

Hello there,

We rent out 3 rooms on the top floor of our family home on Avenue de la Jonction, in the district of Saint-Gilles / Chatelain.

The house is quiet and clean, so we are looking for hosts who wish to preserve such an environment.

The space
The room is clean and bright, and includes:

1. FURNITURE : single bed, desk, shelves, and wardrobe.
2. VIEW : large bright window (street side).

4. KITCHEN : fridge, electric hob, microwave, kettle, cutlery and plates (shared with 2 other airbnb rooms).
5. INTERNET : Unlimited broadband wifi access.
6. BIKE SPACE in the hall.
7. LAUNDRY : available nearby in nearby laudromat (but not in the house).
8. PUBLIC PARKING : available on the street (paying).

Respectful and considerate guests need only apply.

Lovely and very quiet room in outstanding and very original house in Saint-Josse, just next to Botanique, and very close to the center. There's a big private yard in front of the house. It's the city but it feels like the countryside.

Une belle, grande et calme chambre dans une maison à l'architecture incroyable et originale située à Saint-Josse, juste à côté de Botanique et très près du centre. Il y a une grande cour privée devant la maison. Bien qu'en ville, on s'y sent comme à la campagne

The space
There's a big open space at the first floor, with living a room and kitchen. The room is upstairs. In the bathroom, you can find a big bathtub.

Du haut de notre cinquième étage, en plein cœur du quartier Sainte Catherine, nous vous accueillons dans notre petit nid calme et douillet.
Ma colocataire Eliana et moi vous proposons un séjour dans notre chambre d'amis. Notre appartement est notre lieu de repos et de travail où nous aimons passer du temps lorsque nous en avons l'occasion.

The space
Notre appartement, situé sous les toits, est très calme malgré la belle dynamique du quartier.
La chambre est composée d'un lit pour deux personnes, d'une commode à tiroirs, une petite table et deux chaises, une penderie. Le Velux donne sur l'arrière du bâtiment, et un petit panorama sur la ville de Bruxelles.
Nous partageons notre petite salle de bain composée d'une douche, un lavabo et les toilettes. Vous aurez la possibilité d'utiliser la cuisine, la vaisselle, et les appareils uniquement pour la préparation du petit déjeuner ou de repas sur le pouce, sandwichs, mais non des plâts à cuire ou élaboré

We are based in a most magnificent estate located in the upper part of town, in the area called “Botanique”, next to the botanic gardens.
This 700 m² estate dating from 1830 was built by an aristocratic family the same year Belgium was declared independent.

The “Botanique” area is located in the 19th century part of the upper town, which mainly developed from the independence of Belgium in 1830 on as the high class residential part of Brussels, and became early 20th century the Brussels center of filmmakers. Our house hosted the headquarters of PARAMOUNT during those years.

Staying at our place makes guest discover a unique and hidden patrimonium.

Guest access
Acces to the entire estate.

19th Century mansion in trendy Brussels' Chatelain area. Near and well communicated with city centre by public transport. Quiet and calm with garden view and street view. Avenue Louise at 1km and Horta museum around the corner. Reputed gastronomic quarter. For those who appreciate a touch of nostalgia and vintage charm over 5-star hotel allure.
(!) From 3 people, access to all parts of the house. Less than 3 people: access to complete first floor.

The space
My place is not a five star hotel. It however has charm as it is a mansion, a maison de maître, built in 1895. It has history too: a jew was hidden for the Germans during the second world war for four years in the little room beside the toilet in between the ground floor and the first floor. The former owner was a close friend of Victor Horta, Brussels most famous art deco architect, and made 'gravures' or paintings on many of his houses in this neighbourhood
Appartement situé pas loin de la université ULB, près de la bois de la cambre, tram 8 et 25. Bus 41, just devant. Quartier résidentiel agréable. Calme.

This is suitable for a family with 1 or 2 children.
When renting, the large bathroom is available for the sole use. Rooms and bathroom are on the top floor.To get to the city you have to walk 4 minutes to the metro.
The Atomium can be reached in 10 minutes on foot.

The space
You have a nice view of the Atomium from the room 1 or the hallway.

There are many shops nearby.

This private room is situated in a shared-use house, built in the traditional Belgium architecture style. It is located in the affluent district of Uccle in southern Brussels, with a magnificent living environment and convenient means of transport.

The European Parliament, the headquarters of the EU, the Atomium, the Grand Place, the Manekken Piss and the Free University of Brussels are accessible directly by public transport.

The homestay is managed by the NPO “Kids and Women First”.

The space
Built in the traditional style of Brussels, the house impresses with its charming flair on all levels. The clearly arranged rooms which are completed by timeless and exclusive bathrooms - mostly outside the rooms - are spread over three floors.

Guest access
Even if the house itself is shared with other guests and a little studio downstairs, your room is of course exclusively yours and lockable with your individual key.

Staying at Anne and Thomas' is staying in a listed historical monument. You have a unique opportunity to wake-up to a gorgeous view of a sunrise Art Nouveau stained glass window; to enjoy the fire in a neo Flemish Renaissance dining room, or just hang on the couch with our cats :-)
By staying with us, you help to finance the restauration of our home and preserve this amazing piece of architecture for future generations.
Questions? Feel free to ask us!

The space
